events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car and a streetlight on March 31st in downtown area.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident after verifying keywords related to vehicle damage and collision.
An agent from the auto claims team has been assigned to handle the case efficiently.
Customer was contacted and notified that the claim was received and is now being processed.
Requested relevant documents including police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimate.
Customer provided all requested documents promptly to assist with claim investigation.
Investigation into the cause and extent of damage to the vehicle has begun by claims adjuster.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of damages sustained in vehicle collision.
A settlement offer based on repair costs and policy coverage was sent to the customer.
Customer responded positively to the settlement terms and expressed satisfaction with the process.
The claim was officially approved following agreement on settlement amount.
Payment covering the approved repair costs was issued and sent to the customerâ€™s bank account.
The claim has been closed successfully after payment issuance and customer confirmation.
All records and documentation regarding this auto accident claim have been archived.
